Detailed Description

FSM module Module that handles FSMs

Define Documentation

#define orxFSM_KU32_FLAG_NONE   0x00000000

No flags (default behaviour)

#define orxFSM_KU32_FLAG_NOT_EXPANDABLE   0x00000001

The state machine will not be expandable

orxFSM_STATE *  _pstBeginningState,
orxFSM_STATE *  _pstEndingState,
const orxFSM_CONDITION_FUNCTION  _pfnCondition 
)

Add a link.

Parameters:
[in] _pstStateMachine The state machine.
[in] _pstBeginningState The state marking the beginning of the link.
[in] _pstEndingState The state marking the ending of the link.
[in] _pfnCondition Condition callback.
Returns:
Returns the new link.

orxU16  _u16Id,
const orxFSM_ACTION_FUNCTION  _pfnInit,
const orxFSM_ACTION_FUNCTION  _pfnExecute,
const orxFSM_ACTION_FUNCTION  _pfnExit 
)

Add a state, setting it as the initial state if it is the first one.

Parameters:
[in] _pstStateMachine The state machine.
[in] _u16Id Identifier for the state.
[in] _pfnInit Init callback.
[in] _pfnExecute Execute callback.
[in] _pfnExit Exit callback.
Returns:
Returns the new state.

orxDLLAPI orxFSM* orxFASTCALL orxFSM_Create ( orxU16  _u16NbStates,
orxU32  _u32NbLinks,
orxU32  _u32NbInstances,
orxU32  _u32Flags,
orxMEMORY_TYPE  _eMemType 
)

Create a state machine and return a pointer on it.

Parameters:
[in] _u16NbStates Number of states.
[in] _u32NbLinks Number of links.
[in] _u32NbInstances Number of instances.
[in] _u32Flags Flags used by the state machine.
[in] _eMemType Memory type to use.
Returns:
Returns a pointer on the state machine or orxNULL if failed.

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL orxFSM_Update ( orxFSM *  _pstStateMachine  ) 

Update all instances of a state machine. If current state is orxNULL, it enters the initial state.

Parameters:
[in] _pstStateMachine The state machine.
Returns:
Returns the status of the operation. It fails if nothing has happend.

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL orxFSM_UpdateInstance ( orxFSM_INSTANCE *  _pstInstance  ) 

Update an instance of a state machine. If current state is orxNULL, it enters the initial state.

Parameters:
[in] _pstInstance The instance.
Returns:
Returns the status of the operation. It fails if nothing has happend.
